title: bolgoda lake front 2 storied brand new luxuary house in moratuwa
details: Architect designed brand new 2 storied beautiful house with panoramic views of bolgoda river,is for sale. 20 feet wide roads,highly residential with respectable neighbourhood..Only 1 k..m to the heart of the city,Moratuwa,. .living dinning 5 bed rooms 3 bath rooms,maids room and bath room, roof top,large open areas facing river,balconies for every bed room,pantry,wet kitchen,store room,,2 vehicle parking car porch,large beautiful garden facing the river,parapet walls and remote roller shutters ,hot water,over head tank,cctv camaras,,,........A very calm and quiet place,with greenery..........
